QuestData.Title: Lost in the Darkness
QuestData.Description: Some would say that we are lucky to be alive. Those people would be idiots. At least had we died we would not have had to face the Warchief's wrath. Alas, what's done is done! Now we must attempt to regain our lost honor.$B$BThe third ship in our fleet sank off the coast of the Skittering Dark, northwest of here. Those that made it to shore quickly found themselves swarmed by the giant spiders of the area and encased in webbing.$B$BIf there are survivors we must free them! Go, $n! To the Skittering Dark!
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue 6 Orc Sea Dogs from the Skittering Dark.
QuestData.CompletionText: Thankfully we're almost out of ale.
QuestData.RewardText: Lok'tar, $n! Once the ale wears off my orcs will be ready!
